author: melonpawel

comments.content:
The quality of the font suggests an amateur effort, and you might find it at a site like AbstractFonts.com. At least that is where I would probably start looking for it. My iPad is not so great for doing this, or I would try it myself.

- Mike Yanega

Or at a site like DAFont...

Kuba reczny by Jakub Degórski

[http://www.dafont.com/kuba-reczny.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200022/http:/www.dafont.com/kuba-reczny.font "http://www.dafont.com/kuba-reczny.font")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sila1_5714.jpg)
Thanks a lot! You are awesome :)
